Title: Provides that dogs engaged in hunting and training as authorized by the environmental conservation law, shall not be deemed to be running at large
Summary: Provides that dogs engaged in hunting and training as authorized by the environmental conservation law, shall not be deemed to be running at large in violation of any local law or ordinance.
LawCode: Amd ยง122, Ag & Mkts L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the agriculture and markets law, in relation to dogs engaged in hunting or training
